Dr. VARSHA is an amazing doctor. Always listens to the concern and check properly before prescribing any medicine. Always try to be available whenever we need even if her schedule is fully occupied.

review:
Visiting Dr. Saxena since 2018 for pediatric consultation for asthma, vaccinations. Highly recommended.

Very patient with children, explains all details on medicines, how to administer them, and general healthcare practices. **** ************* ******* Her clinic is also run quite efficiently with minimal staff. We like the facility for online booking and cashless payments.
All good. Very understanding and few to discuss. Gives time. Explains possible solutions. Thank you.
Practo appointment is pointless. Always first come first serve. Reception is not active and attitude is like they dont care at all.
